General.Name: Beijing Roborock Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Roborock Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and production of home cleaning devices in China. Its products comprising robotics, cordless, and wet/dry vacuum cleaners, as well as floor washing machines and other cleaning appliances. It offers its products in the United States, Germany, Spain, France, and internationally. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Beijing, China.
